name: API v2 WIP
description: Postman pack for basic testing of API v2

requests.name: Create a Payment
requests.description:
**POST /v2/payments/create**
Creates a new payment and returns a hash containing the details of the created payment.


**Required Fields**

currency:3 character ISO 4217 currency code

beneficiary\_id:Unique ID of beneficiary

amount:Amount of Payment to 2dp

reason:Reason for payment

reference:Reference

**Optional Fields**

Payment\_date:ISO 8601 Date when the payment should be paid

Payment\_type:Can be priority or regular

conversion\_id:Conversion unique ID

payer\_entity\_type:Type of payer - can be individual or company

payer\_company\_name:Payer company name

payer\_first\_name:Payer first name

payer\_last\_name:Payer second name

payer\_city:Payer city

payer\_postcode:Payer postcode

payer\_state\_or\_province:Payer state or province

payer\_date\_of\_birth:Payer date of birth(company creation date when payer\_entity\_type is company)

identification\_type: name of ID type

identification\_value: ID value

on\_behalf\_of: contact ID

**Response**

id:Payment unique ID

payer\_id:Unique payer ID

amount:Amount of Payment to 2dp

beneficiary\_id	:ID of the beneficiary

currency:3 character ISO 4217 currency code

conversion\_id:Conversion unique ID

reference:Reference

payment\_type:Can be standard or local

payment\_date:ISO 8601 Date when the payment should be paid

reason:Reason for payment

status:Status of the payment

transferred\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Payment was sent

authorisation\_steps\_required:Number of authorisation steps required

creator\_contact\_id:ID of the contact

last\_updater\_contact\_id:ID of the contact

short\_reference:transfer ID of the payment

failure\_reason:Reason for the failure

created\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was created

updated\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was last updated

requests.name: Retrieve Security Details
requests.description:
**GET /v2/contacts/security\_details** - Returns a json structure with all the security questions for the active contact


**Response**

security\_questions - The list of security questions for the currently logged in user

- security\_code - An enumeration (sec\_q\_hol\_dst, sec\_q\_fav\_animal, sec\_q\_pet\_name, sec\_q\_fav\_city) that identifies the security question

- security\_question - A security question in English that needs to be answered for a successful login.

requests.name: Authorise a Payment
requests.description:
**POST /v2/payments/{id}/authorise** 
  Authorise a payment and returns a json structure containing the details of the authorisation object.


**Required Fields**

id:Unique ID of payment

**Response**

authorisation\_id:Payment Authorisation unique ID

payment\_id:ID of the payment

authoriser\_id:contact ID of the authoriser

status:status of the authorisation - valid/invalid

created\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was created

updated\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was last updated

requests.name: Release a settlement
requests.description:
** POST /v2/settlements/{id}/release **
  Move the Settlement to state 'released', meaning it is ready to be processed.

**Required Fields**

id - Settlement ID

**Optional Fields**

on\_behalf\_of: Contact ID of the client

**Response**

id:Settlement unique ID

short_reference:Unique human readable identifier

status:Status of the Settlement

conversion\_ids:Array containing IDs of all Conversions in the Settlement

entries:

created\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was created

updated\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was last updated

released\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was released

requests.name: Delete A Beneficiary
requests.description:
**GET /v2/beneficiaries/{id}/delete** - Returns a json structure containing the details of the requested beneficiary.

**Required Fields**

id: ID of the beneficiary

**Optional Fields**

on\_behalf\_of: Contact ID of the client

**Response**

id: ID of the Beneficiary

bank\_account\_holder\_name: Bank account holder's name

email: Email address of the Beneficiary

beneficiary\_address: Address of the beneficiary

beneficiary\_country: Country

currency: 3 character ISO 4217 currency code

bank\_address: Bank address

bank\_country: Bank country

routing\_code\_type_1: The routing type code that identifies the bank account for the 'regular' payment type

routing\_code\_value\_1: Routing code value 1

routing\_code\_type\_2: The routing type code that identifies the bank account for the 'regular' payment type

routing\_code\_value\_2: Routing code value 2

bank\_name: Bank name

bank\_account\_type: Bank account type

payment\_types: priority, regular

creator\_contact\_id: Contact ID

bic\_swift: BIC/SWIFT code

iban: International bank account number

default\_beneficiary: Boolean. Default beneficiary

account\_number: Account number

name: Nickname

beneficiary\_entity\_type: Beneficiary type

beneficiary\_company\_name: Beneficiary company name

beneficiary\_first\_name: Beneficiary first name

beneficiary\_last\_name: Beneficiary last name

beneficiary\_city: Beneficiary city

beneficiary\_state\_or\_province: Beneficiary state or province

beneficiary\_postcode: Beneficiary postcode

beneficiary\_identification\_type: name of ID type

beneficiary\_identification\_value: ID value

created\_at: ISO 8601 Date of when record was created

updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date of when record was last updated

requests.name: Find a Payment
requests.description:
**GET /v2/payments/find** 
  Returns an Array of Payment objects matching the search criteria.

**Optional Fields**

short\_reference: shortened reference

Currency:3 character ISO 4217 currency code

Amount:Amount of Payment to 2dp

Amount\_from:Amount of Payment to 2dp

Amount\_to:	Amount of Payment to 2dp

Status:Status of the payment

Reason:Reason for payment

Payment\_date\_from:ISO 8601 Date when the payment should be paid

Payment\_date\_to:ISO 8601 Date when the payment should be paid

Transferred\_at\_from:ISO 8601 Datetime when the payment should be transfered

Transferred\_at\_to:ISO 8601 Datetime when the payment should be transfered

Created\_at\_from:ISO 8601 Datetime when the payment was created

Created\_at\_to:ISO 8601 Datetime when the payment was created

Updated\_at\_from:ISO 8601 Datetime when the payment was updated

Updated\_at\_to:ISO 8601 Datetime when the payment was updated

Beneficiary\_id:ID of the beneficiary

Conversion\_id:Conversion unique ID

page	Which page to show

per\_page:Maximum number of entries to return

order:The field to order entries by

order\_asc\_desc	Whether the order is ascending (asc) or descending (desc)

on\_behalf\_of: contact ID

**Response**

  Payments:An array of Payment objects
  
  Id:Payment unique ID
  
  Amount:Amount of Payment to 2dp
  
  Beneficiary\_id:ID of the beneficiary
  
  currency:3 character ISO 4217 currency code
  
  conversion\_id:Conversion unique ID
  
  reference:Reference
  
  payment\_type:Can be standard or local
  
   payment\_date:ISO 8601 Date when the payment should be paid
   
   reason:Reason for payment
   
   status:Status of the payment
   
   transferred\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Payment was sent
   
   authorisation\_steps\_required:Number of authorisation steps required
   
   creator\_contact\_id:ID of the contact
   
   last\_updater\_contact\_id:ID of the contact
   
   short\_reference:transfer ID of the payment
   
   failure\_reason:Reason for the failure
   
   payer\_id:Unique payer id
   
   created\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was created
   
   updated\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was last updated
   
pagination:Pagination details relevant to the search query

  total\_entries:Total entries for this search query
  
  total\_pages:Total pages for this search query
  
  current\_page:The current page of the search query
  
  per\_page:The amount of search results to return per page
  
  previous\_page:The previous page for this search query
  
  next\_page:The next page for this search query
  
  order:The order of the search returned for this search query
  
  order\_asc\_desc:The order of results returned e.g. 'asc' or 'desc'

requests.name: Find a Settlements
requests.description:
**GET /v2/settlements/find**
Returns an array of Settlement objects for the given search criteria

**Required Fields**

--



**Optional Fields**

short_reference:Unique human readable identifier

status:The current status of the settlement

created\_at\_from:ISO 8601 Datetime when the settlement was created

created\_at\_to:ISO 8601 Datetime when the settlement was created

updated\_at\_from:ISO 8601 Datetime when the settlement was updated

updated\_at\_to:ISO 8601 Datetime when the settlement was updated

released\_at\_from:ISO 8601 Datetime when the settlement was updated

released\_at\_to:ISO 8601 Datetime when the settlement was updated

page:Which page to show

per\_page:Maximum number of entries to return

order:The field to order entries by

order\_asc\_desc:Whether the order is ascending (asc) or descending (desc)

on_behalf\_of:Contact ID of the client


**Response**

settlements:An array of Settlement objects

id:Settlement unique ID

short\_reference:Unique human readable identifier

status:Status of the Settlement

conversion\_ids:Array containing IDs of all Conversions in the Settlement

entries:

created\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was created

updated\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was last updated

released\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was released

pagination:Pagination details relevant to the search query

total\_entries:Total entries for this search query

total\_pages:Total pages for this search query

current\_page:The current page of the search query

per\_page:The amount of search results to return per page

previous\_page:	The previous page for this search query

next\_page:The next page for this search query

order:The order of the search returned for this search query

order\_asc\_desc:The order of results returned e.g. 'asc' or 'desc'

requests.name: Update a Payment
requests.description:
**POST /v2/payments/{id}**
Edits a prevoiusly created payment and returns a hash containing the details of the edited payment.


**Required Fields**

Id:Unique ID of payment

Currency:3 character ISO 4217 currency code

Beneficiary\_id	:Unique ID of beneficiary

amount:Amount of Payment to 2dp

reason	:Reason for payment

**Optional Fields**

Payment\_date:ISO 8601 Date when the payment should be paid

Payment\_type:Can be priority or regular

Reference:Reference

conversion\_id:Conversion unique ID

payer\_entity\_type:Type of payer - can be individual or company

payer\_company\_name:Payer company name

payer\_first\_name:Payer first name

payer\_last\_name:Payer second name

payer\_city:Payer city

payer\_postcode:Payer postcode

payer\_state\_or\_province:Payer state or province

payer\_date\_of\_birth:Payer date of birth(company creation date when payer\_entity\_type is company)

payer\_identification\_type: name of ID type

payer\_identification\_value: ID type value

on\_behalf\_of: contact ID

**Response**

id:Payment unique ID

payer\_id:Unique payer ID

amount:Amount of Payment to 2dp

beneficiary\_id	:ID of the beneficiary

currency:3 character ISO 4217 currency code

conversion\_id:Conversion unique ID

reference:Reference

payment\_type:Can be standard or local

payment\_date:ISO 8601 Date when the payment should be paid

reason:Reason for payment

status:Status of the payment

transferred\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Payment was sent

authorisation\_steps\_required:Number of authorisation steps required

creator\_contact\_id:ID of the contact

last\_updater\_contact\_id:ID of the contact

short\_reference:transfer ID of the payment

failure\_reason:Reason for the failure

created\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was created

updated\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was last updated

requests.name: Available Currencies
requests.description:
**GET /v2/reference/currencies** - Returns a list of all the currencies that are tradeable

**Response**

currencies

- code: The ISO4217 code that identifies the currency

- decimal\_places: The number of decimal places for a subunit of the currency

- name: The name of the currency

requests.name: Retrieve Payment Authorisations
requests.description:
**GET /v2/payments/{id}/authorisations** 
  Returns an Array of Payment Authorisation objects.


**Required Fields**

id:Unique ID of payment

**Optional Fields**

Page:Which page to show

Per\_pag:Maximum number of entries to return

order:The field to order entries by

order\_asc\_desc:Whether the order is ascending (asc) or descending (desc


**Response**

Authorisations:An array of Payment Authorisation objects

 Authorisation\_id: Payment Authorisation unique ID
 
  Payment\_id	:ID of the payment
  
  Authoriser\_id:contact ID of the authoriser
  
 Status: status of the authorisation-valid\/invalid
 
created\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Payment Authorisation was created
  
updated\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Payment Authorisation was updated
  
created\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was created

updated\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was last updated
 
pagination:Pagination details relevant to the search query

total\_entries:Total entries for this search query

total\_pages:Total pages for this search query

current\_page:The current page of the search query

per\_page:The amount of search results to return per page

previous\_page:The previous page for this search query

next\_page:The next page for this search query

order:The order of the search returned for this search query

order\_asc\_desc:The order of results returned e.g. 'asc' or 'desc'

requests.name: Remove a Conversion from a Settlement
requests.description:
**POST /v2/settlements/{id}/remove_conversion**
Remove a Conversion from an open Settlement. Returns the updated Settlement object.

**Required Fields**

id:Settlement ID

conversion_id:ID of the conversion


**Optional Fields**

on\_behalf\_of: Contact ID of the client


**Response**

id:Settlement unique ID

short\_reference:Unique human readable identifier

status:Status of the Settlement

conversion\_ids:Array containing IDs of all Conversions in the Settlement

entries:	

created\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was created

updated\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was last updated

released\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was released

requests.name: Find Contact
requests.description:
**GET /v2/contacts/find** - Return an array containing hashes of details of the contacts matching the search criteria for the active user.

**Optional Fields**

account\_name: Account name

account\_id: ID of account

first\_name: First name

last\_name: Last name

email\_address: Email address

your\_reference: Your unique ID

phone\_number: Phone number

login\_id: Login ID of the contact which must be unique. (only updateable by a broker)

status: Status (only updateable by a broker)

locale: The locale of the user as combination of an ISO 639-1 language code and ISO\_3166-1 regional code e.g. en, en-US, fr-FR

timezone: The timezone of the user as it exists in the IANA tz database e.g. Europe/London, America/New\_York (reference http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List\_of\_tz\_database\_time\_zones#List)

page: Which page to show

per\_page: Maximum number of entries to return
order: The field to order entries by
order\_asc\_desc: Whether the order is ascending (asc) or descending (desc)


**Response**

contacts: An array of Contact objects

  - id: ID of the contact

  - account\_name: Account name

  - account\_id: ID of the account

  - your\_reference: Your unique ID of the contact

  - email\_address: Email address

  - first\_name: First name

  - last\_name: Last name

  - phone\_number: Phone number

  - mobile\_phone\_number: Mobile phone number

  - locale: The locale of the user as combination of an ISO 639-1 language code and ISO_3166-1 regional code e.g. en, en-US, fr-FR

  - login\_id: Login ID

  - status: Status

  - timezone: The timezone of the user as it exists in the IANA tz database e.g. Europe/London, America/New\_York (reference http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List\_of\_tz\_database\_time\_zones#List)

  - created\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Contact was created

  - updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Contact was last updated

pagination: Pagination details relevant to the search query

  - total\_entries: Total entries for this search query

  - total\_pages: Total pages for this search query

  - current\_page: Current page of the search query

  - per\_page: Amount of search results to return per page

  - previous\_page: Previous page for this search query

  - next\_page: Next page for this search query

  - order: Order of the search returned for this search query

  - order\_asc\_desc: Order of results returned e.g. 'asc' or 'desc'

requests.name: Reset security details for a Contact
requests.description:
**POST /v2/contacts/reset\_security\_details** - Resets the users details if the token is valid contact.

**Required Fields**

token - The unique and temporary token that identifies this reset security details request

password - The password to use for the user

security\_question\_one - One of the four allowed security questions (sec\_q\_fav\_city, sec\_q\_pet\_name, sec\_q\_fav\_animal, sec\_q\_hol\_dst)

security\_question\_two - One of the four allowed security questions (sec\_q\_fav\_city, sec\_q\_pet\_name, sec\_q\_fav\_animal, sec\_q\_hol\_dst)

security\_question\_three - One of the four allowed security questions (sec\_q\_fav\_city, sec\_q\_pet\_name, sec\_q\_fav\_animal, sec\_q\_hol\_dst)

security\_answer\_one - The answer for security\_answer\_one

security\_answer\_two - The answer for security\_answer\_two

security\_answer\_three - The answer for security\_answer\_three

**Response**

requests.name: Retrieve Multiple Rates
requests.description:
**GET /v2/rates/find** - Returns core rate for multiple currency pairs in a single API call

**Required Fields**

currency\_pair - Currency pair eg. EURUSD,GBPZAR

**Optional Fields**

on\_behalf\_of - Contact ID of the client

ignore\_invalid\_pairs - Ignore invalid pairings

**Response**

rates

unavailable - All currencies that are currently unavailable

requests.name: Retrieve a Contact
requests.description:
**GET /v2/contacts/{id}** - Returns a json structure containing the details of the requested contact.


**Required Fields**

id: ID of the contact

**Response**

id: ID of the contact

account\_name: Account name

account\_id: ID of the account

your\_reference: Your unique ID

email\_address: Email address

first\_name: First name

last\_name: Last name

phone\_number: Phone number

mobile\_phone\_number: Mobile phone number

locale: The locale of the user as combination of an ISO 639-1 language code and ISO\_3166-1 regional code e.g. en, en-US, fr-FR

login\_id: Login ID

status: Status

timezone: The timezone of the user as it exists in the IANA tz database e.g. Europe/London, America/New\_York (reference http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List\_of\_tz\_database\_time\_zones#List)

created\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Contact was created

updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Contact was last updated

requests.name: Find Beneficiaries
requests.description:
**GET /v2/beneficiaries/find** - Return an array containing json structures of details of the accounts matching the search criteria for the logged in user.

**Optional Fields**

bank\_account\_holder\_name: Bank account holder's name

beneficiary\_country: A two-letter country code as defined in ISO 3166-1 that defines the beneficiary's country

currency: 3 character ISO 4217 currency code

account\_number: Account number

routing\_code\_type: Routing code type

routing\_code\_value: Routing code value

payment\_types: Priority or regular

bic\_swift: 8 or 11 char ISO 9362 BIC/SWIFT code

iban: up to 34 char international bank account number

default\_beneficiary: Check whether beneficiary is a default

bank\_name: Name of the bank

bank\_account\_type: Type of bank account

name: Nickname for beneficiary

beneficiary\_entity\_type: Type of beneficiary - can be individual or company

beneficiary\_company\_name: Beneficiary company name

beneficiary\_first\_name: Beneficiary first name

beneficiary\_last\_name: Beneficiary second name

beneficiary\_city: Beneficiary city

beneficiary\_postcode: Beneficiary postcode

beneficiary\_state\_or\_province: Beneficiary state or province

beneficiary\_date\_of\_birth: Beneficiary date of birth(company creation date when beneficiary\_entity\_type is company)

page: Which page to show

per\_page: Maximum number of entries to return

order: The field to order entries by

order\_asc\_desc: Whether the order is ascending (asc) or descending (desc)

on\_behalf\_of: Contact ID of the client

**Response**

beneficiaries: An array of Beneficiary objects

  - id: ID of the Beneficiary

  - bank\_account\_holder\_name: Bank account holder's name

  - email: Email address of the Beneficiary

  - beneficiary\_address: Address of the beneficiary

  - beneficiary\_country: Country

  - currency: 3 character ISO 4217 currency code

  - bank\_address: Bank address

  - bank\_country: Bank country

  - routing\_code\_type\_1: The routing type code that identifies the bank account for the 'regular' payment type

  - routing\_code\_value\_1: Routing code value 1

  - routing\_code\_type\_2: The routing type code that identifies the bank account for the 'regular' payment type

  - routing\_code\_value\_2: Routing code value 2

  - bank\_name: Bank name

  - bank\_account\_type: Bank account type

  - payment\_types: priority, regular

  - creator\_contact\_id: Contact ID

  - bic\_swift: BIC/SWIFT code

  - iban: International bank account number

  - default\_beneficiary: Boolean. Default beneficiary

  - account\_number: Account number

  - name: Nickname

  - beneficiary\_entity\_type: Beneficiary type

  - beneficiary\_company\_name: Beneficiary company name

  - beneficiary\_first\_name: Beneficiary first name

  - beneficiary\_last\_name: Beneficiary last name

  - beneficiary\_date\_of\_birth: DOB of beneficiary

  - beneficiary\_identification\_type: Type of id

  - beneficiary\_identification\_value: value of id type

  - beneficiary\_city: Beneficiary city

  - beneficiary\_state\_or\_province: Beneficiary state or province

  - beneficiary\_postcode: Beneficiary postcode

  - created\_at: ISO 8601 Date of when record was created

  - updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date of when record was last updated

pagination: Pagination details relevant to the search query

  - total\_entries: Total entries for this search query

  - total\_pages: Total pages for this search query

  - current\_page: Current page of the search query

  - per\_page: Amount of search results to return per page

  - previous\_page: Previous page for this search query

  - next\_page: Next page for this search query

  - order: Order of the search returned for this search query

  - order\_asc\_desc: Order of results returned e.g. 'asc' or 'desc'

requests.name: Unrelease a Settlement
requests.description:
**POST /v2/settlements/{id}/unrelease**
Move the Settlement back to state 'open', allowing Conversions to be added or removed


**Required Fields**

id:Settlement ID

**Optional Fields**

on\_behalf\_of: Contact ID of the client

id:Settlement ID

**Response**

id:Settlement unique ID

short\_reference:Unique human readable identifier

status:Status of the Settlement

conversion\_ids:Array containing IDs of all Conversions in the Settlement

entries:	

created\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was created

updated\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was last updated

released\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was released

requests.name: Create Account
requests.description:
**POST /v2/accounts/create** - Creates a new account and returns a json structure containing the details of the requested account.

**Required Fields**

account\_name: Name of the account

**Optional Fields**

brand: The brand to associate with this account

your\_reference: Your unique customer ID

status: Status of the account. If nothing is supplied, the default setting is enabled

street: Street address

state\_or\_province: name of state or province

city: City

postal\_code: Post Code or Zip Code

country: A two-letter country codes as defined in ISO 3166-1

spread\_table: Name of spread table

identification\_type: name of ID type

identification\_value: ID value

**Response**
	
id: ID of the account

account\_name: Name of the account

brand: The brand that is associated with this account

your\_reference: Your unique customer ID

legal\_entity\_type	

status: Status of the account

street: First line of the address

city: City

state\_or\_province: name of state or province

country: Country

postal\_code: Post Code or Zip code

spread\_table: Name of spread table

created\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Account was created

updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Account was last updated

identification\_type: name of ID type

identification\_value: ID value

short\_reference: shortened reference

beneficiary\_country: A two-letter country code as defined in ISO 3166-1 that defines the beneficiary's country

routing\_code\_value\_2: Routing code value 2

iban: International bank account number

beneficiary\_entity\_type: Type of beneficiary - can be individual or company

beneficiary\_company\_name: Beneficiary company name

beneficiary\_first\_name: Beneficiary first name

beneficiary\_last\_name: Beneficiary second name

beneficiary\_city: Beneficiary city

beneficiary\_postcode: Beneficiary postcode

beneficiary\_state\_or\_province: Beneficiary state or province

beneficiary\_date\_of\_birth: Beneficiary date of birth(company creation date when beneficiary\_entity\_type is company)

identification\_type: name of ID type

identification\_value: ID value

**Response**

id: ID of the Beneficiary

bank\_account\_holder\_name: Bank account holder's name

email: Email address of the Beneficiary

beneficiary\_address: Address of the beneficiary

beneficiary\_country: Country

currency: 3 character ISO 4217 currency code

bank\_address: Bank address

bank\_country: Bank country

routing\_code\_type\_1: The routing type code that identifies the bank account for the 'regular' payment type

routing\_code\_value\_1: Routing code value 1

routing\_code\_type\_2: The routing type code that identifies the bank account for the 'regular' payment type

routing\_code\_value\_2: Routing code value 2

bank\_name: Bank name

bank\_account\_type: Bank account type

payment\_types: priority, regular

creator\_contact\_id: Contact ID

bic\_swift: BIC/SWIFT code

iban: International bank account number

default\_beneficiary: Boolean. Default beneficiary

account\_number: Account number

name: Nickname

beneficiary\_entity\_type: Beneficiary type

beneficiary\_company\_name: Beneficiary company name

beneficiary\_first\_name: Beneficiary first name

beneficiary\_last\_name: Beneficiary last name

beneficiary\_city: Beneficiary city

beneficiary\_state\_or\_province: Beneficiary state or province

beneficiary\_postcode: Beneficiary postcode

created\_at: ISO 8601 Date of when record was created

updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date of when record was last updated

requests.name: Delete a Payment
requests.description:
**POST /v2/payments/{id}/delete ** 
   Delete a prevoiusly created payment and returns a hash containing the details of the deleted payment.


**Required Fields**

id:Unique ID of payment

**Optional Fields**

on\_behalf\_of: contact ID

**Response**

Id:Payment unique ID

Payer\_id:Unique payer ID

Amount:Amount of Payment to 2dp

Beneficiary\_id:ID of the beneficiary

Currency:3 character ISO 4217 currency code

Conversion\_id:Conversion unique ID

Reference:Reference

Payment\_type:Can be standard or local

Payment\_date:ISO 8601 Date when the payment should be paid

reason	:Reason for payment

status:Status of the payment

transferred\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Payment was sent

authorisation\_steps\_required:Number of authorisation steps required

creator\_contact\_id:ID of the contact

last\_updater\_contact\_id:ID of the contact

short\_reference:transfer ID of the payment

failure\_reason:Reason for the failure

created\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was created

updated\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was last updated

requests.name: Retrieve a Settlement
requests.description:
**GET /v2/settlements/{id}**
Returns a Settlement object for the requested ID.

**Response**

id:Settlement unique ID

short\_reference:Unique human readable identifier

status:Status of the Settlement

conversion\_ids:Array containing IDs of all Conversions in the Settlement

entries:	

created\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was created

updated\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was last updated

released\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was released

requests.name: Retrieve an Account

street: First line of the address

city: City

state\_or\_province: Name of State or Province

requests.name: Create a Settlement
requests.description:
**POST /v2/settlements/create**
Creates a new settlement and returns the settlement object

--

on\_behalf\_of: Contact ID of the client



**Response**


id:Settlement unique ID

status:Status of the Settlement

requests.name: Create Signup
requests.description:
**POST /v2/signups/create** - Creates a new account & contact and returns a user signup request.

**Required Fields**

email\_address: Email address

**Optional Fields**

first\_name: First name

last\_name: Last name

company\_name: Company name

reason: Reason for registering

type: Type of request

requests.name: Update a Contact
requests.description:
**POST /v2/contacts/{id}** - Updates an existing contact and returns a hash containing the details of the requested contact.

**Required Fields**

id: ID of the contact

**Optional Fields**

first\_name: First name

last\_name: Last name

email\_address: Email address

your\_reference: Your unique ID

phone\_number: Phone number

mobile\_phone\_number: Mobile phone number

login\_id: Login ID of the contact which must be unique. (only updateable by a broker)

status: Status (only updateable by a broker)

locale: The locale of the user as combination of an ISO 639-1 language code and ISO\_3166-1 regional code e.g. en, en-US, fr-FR

timezone: The timezone of the user as it exists in the IANA tz database e.g. Europe/London, America/New\_York (reference http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List\_of\_tz\_database\_time\_zones#List)


**Response**

id: ID of the contact

account\_name: Account name

account\_id: ID of the account

your\_reference: Your unique ID

email\_address: Email address

first\_name: First name

last\_name: Last name

phone\_number: Phone number

mobile\_phone\_number: Mobile phone number

locale: The locale of the user as combination of an ISO 639-1 language code and ISO\_3166-1 regional code e.g. en, en-US, fr-FR

login\_id: Login ID

status: Status

timezone: The timezone of the user as it exists in the IANA tz database e.g. Europe/London, America/New\_York (reference http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List\_of\_tz\_database\_time\_zones#List)

created\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Contact was created

updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Contact was last updated

requests.name: End API Session
requests.description: **POST /v2/authenticate/close\_session** - All sessions must come to an end, either manually using the 'close session' call, or by timing out. If you know that the session is no longer required, for example because the end-user wants to logout, it is good practise to explicitly close the session rather than leaving it to time-out.

requests.name: Update an account
requests.description:
**POST /v2/accounts/{id}** - Updates an existing account and returns a json structure containing the details of the requested account.

**Required Fields**	

id: ID of the account

**Optional Fields**

account\_name: Name of the account

legal\_entity\_type: Account type

brand: The brand to associate with this account

your\_reference: Your unique customer ID

status: Status of the account

street: Street address

city: City

state\_or\_province: Name of state or province

postal\_code: Post Code or Zip Code

country: A two-letter country codes as defined in ISO 3166-1

spread\_table: Name of spread table

identification\_type: name of ID type

identification\_value: ID value

**Response**
	
id: ID of the account

account\_name: Name of the account

brand: The brand that is associated with this account

your\_reference: Your unique customer ID

legal\_entity\_type	

status: Status of the account

street: First line of the address

city: City

state\_or\_province: Name of state or province 

country: Country

postal\_code: Post Code or Zip code

spread\_table: Name of spread table

created\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Account was created

updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Account was last updated

identification\_type: name of ID type

identification\_value: ID value

short\_reference: Shortened reference

requests.name: Detailed Rates
requests.description:
**GET /v2/rates/detailed - Returns rate for the client**

**Required Fields**

buy\_currency - Currency you are converting to

sell\_currency - Currency you are converting from

fixed\_side - The currency that the amount applies to, either buy or sell

amount - The amount to 2 decimal places

**Optional Fields**

conversion\_date - The date you want the bought currency

on\_behalf\_of - Contact ID of the client

**Response**

settlement\_cut\_off\_time

currency\_pair

client\_buy\_currency

client\_sell\_currency

client\_buy\_amount

client\_sell\_amount

fixed\_side

mid\_market\_rate

client\_rate

partner\_rate

core\_rate

deposit\_required

deposit\_amount

deposit\_currency

requests.name: Account (logged-in Contact)
requests.description:
**GET /v2/accounts/current** - Returns a json structure containing the details of the active account.

**Response**
	
id: ID of the account

account\_name: Name of the account

brand: The brand that is associated with this account

your\_reference: Your unique customer ID

legal\_entity\_type	

status: Status of the account

street: First line of the address

city: City

state\_or\_province: Name of state or province

country: Country

postal\_code: Post Code or Zip code

spread\_table: Name of spread table

created\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Account was created

updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Account was last updated

identification\_type: name of ID type

identification\_value: ID value

short\_reference: shortened reference

requests.name: Find Balances
requests.description:
**GET /v2/balances/find** - Search for a range of balances and receive a paged response. This is useful if you want to see historic balances.

**Optional Fields**

amount\_from - Amount of balances to 2dp

amount\_to - Amount of balances to 2dp

as\_at\_date - ISO8601 Date Time to view balances at a specific point in time.

page - Which page to show

per\_page - Maximum number of entries to return

order - The field to order entries by

order\_asc\_desc - Whether the order is ascending or descending.

**Response**

balances - An array of balance objects:

- id - Unique ID
- account\_id - Unique ID of related account
- currency - 3 character ISO4217 currency code
- amount - Amount of balance to 2dp
- created\_at - ISO8601 Date when the balance was created
- updated\_at - ISO8601 Date when the balance was last updated

pagination - Pagination details relevant to the search query:

- total\_entries - Total entries for this search query
- total\_pages - Total pages for this search query
- current\_page - Current page of the search query
- per\_page - Amount of search results to return per page
- previous\_page - Previous page for this search query
- next\_page - Next page for this search query
- order - Order of the search returned for this search query
- order\_asc\_desc - Order of results returned

requests.name: Settlement Accounts
requests.description:
**GET /v2/reference/settlement\_accounts** - Returns settlement account information, detailing where funds need to be sent to

**Optional Fields**

currency - The 3 character ISO 4217 currency code of a specific settlement account

**Response**

settlement\_accounts: An array of Settlement Account objects

  - bank\_account\_holder\_name: Name of the bank account holder

  - beneficiary\_address: Address of the beneficiary

  - beneficiary\_country: Country

  - bank\_name: Bank name

  - bank\_address: Bank address

  - bank\_country: Bank country

  - currency: 3 character ISO 4217 currency code

  - bic\_swift: BIC/SWIFT code

  - iban: International bank account number

  - account\_number: Account number

  - routing\_code\_type\_1: A routing code that identifies the bank account, often used for local payments

  - routing\_code\_value\_1: Routing code value 1

  - routing\_code\_type\_2: A routing code that identifies the bank account, often used for local payments

  - routing\_code\_value\_2: Routing code value 2

requests.name: Find Account
requests.description:
**GET /v2/accounts/find** - Return an array containing json structures of details of the accounts matching the search criteria for the logged in user.


**Optional Fields**

account\_name: Name of the account

brand: The brand to associate with this account

your\_reference: Your unique customer ID

status: Status of the account

street: Street address

city: City

state\_or\_province: Name of state or province

postal\_code: Post Code or Zip Code

country: A two-letter country codes as defined in ISO 3166-1

spread\_table: Name of spread table

page: Which page to show

per\_page: Maximum number of entries to return

order: The field to order entries by

order\_asc\_desc: Whether the order is ascending or descending


**Response**

accounts: An array of Account objects

  - id: ID of the account

  - account\_name: Name of account

  - brand: The brand that is associated with this account

  - your\_reference: Your unique customer ID

  - status: Status of the account

  - street: First line of the address

  - city: City

  - state\_or\_province: Name of state or province

  - country: Country

  - postal\_code: Post Code or Zip code

  - spread\_table: Name of spread table

  - created\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Account was created

  - updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Account was last updated

  - identification\_type: Name of ID type

  - identification\_value: ID value

  - short\_reference: shortened reference

pagination: Pagination details relevant to the search query

  - total\_entries: Total entries for this search query

  - total\_pages: Total pages for this search query

  - current\_page: Current page of the search query

  - per\_page: Amount of search results to return per page

  - previous\_page: Previous page for this search query

  - next\_page: Next page for this search query

  - order: Order of the search returned for this search query

  - order\_asc\_desc: Order of results returned e.g. 'asc' or 'desc'

requests.name: Validate Beneficiary Bank Details
requests.description:
**POST /v2/beneficiaries/validate** - Validates Beneficiary details without creating one

**Required Fields**

bank\_country: A two-letter country code as defined in ISO 3166-1 of the bank account

currency: 3 character ISO 4217 currency code

beneficiary\_country: A two-letter country code as defined in ISO 3166-1 that defines the beneficiary's country


**Optional Fields**
	
Key: Description

on\_behalf\_of: Contact ID of the client

account\_number: Account number

routing\_code\_type\_1:Routing code type 1

routing\_code\_value\_1: Routing code value 1

routing\_code\_type\_2: Routing code type 2

routing\_code\_value\_2: Routing code value 2

bic\_swift: 8 or 11 char ISO 9362 BIC/SWIFT code

iban: up to 34 char international bank account number

bank\_address: Address of the bank

bank\_name: Name of the bank

bank\_account\_type: Type of bank account

beneficiary\_entity\_type: Type of beneficiary - can be individual or company

beneficiary\_company\_name: Beneficiary company name

beneficiary\_first\_name: Beneficiary first name

beneficiary\_last\_name: Beneficiary second name

beneficiary\_city: Beneficiary city

beneficiary\_postcode: Beneficiary postcode

beneficiary\_state\_or\_province: Beneficiary state or province

beneficiary\_date\_of\_birth: Beneficiary date of birth(company creation date when beneficiary\_entity\_type is company)

beneficiary\_identification\_type: name of ID type

beneficiary\_identification\_value: id type value

**Response**
	
Key: Description

currency: 3 character ISO 4217 currency code

bank\_address: Bank address

bank\_country: Bank country

routing\_code\_type\_1: The routing type code that identifies the bank account for the 'regular' payment type

beneficiary\_address: Beneficiary address

beneficiary\_country: Country

routing\_code\_value\_1: Routing code value 1

routing\_code\_type\_2: The routing type code that identifies the bank account for the 'regular' payment type

routing\_code\_value\_2: Routing code value 2

bank\_name: Bank name

bank\_account\_type: Bank account type

payment\_types: priority, regular

bic\_swift: BIC/SWIFT code

iban: International bank account number

account\_number: Account number

beneficiary\_entity\_type: Beneficiary type

beneficiary\_company\_name: Beneficiary company name

beneficiary\_first\_name: Beneficiary first name

beneficiary\_last\_name: Beneficiary last name

beneficiary\_city: Beneficiary city

beneficiary\_state\_or\_province: Beneficiary state or province

beneficiary\_postcode: Beneficiary postcode

beneficiary\_date\_of\_birth: DOB of beneficiary

beneficiary\_identification\_type: name of ID type

beneficiary\_identification\_value: id type value

requests.name: Retrieve a Conversion
requests.description:
**GET /v2/conversions/{id}  ** 
   Returns a json structure containing the details of the requested conversion.


**Required Fields**

id:ID of the conversion

**Response**

Id:Conversion unique ID

Account\_id:ID that the Conversion belongs to

Creator\_contact\_id:ID of the Contact that created the Conversion

Short\_reference:Human readable unique ID

Settlement\_date:Datetime of when sell_currency will be debited

Conversion\_date:Datetime of when the buy_currency will be credited

status:Status of the Conversion
between the Partner and Currency Cloud

partner\_status:Status of the Conversion between the Partner and Client

currency\_pair	:A concatenation of the two currencies being converted

buy\_currency	:ISO-4217 three letter currency that was bought

sell\_currency	:ISO-4217 three letter currency that was sold

fixed\_side:The side of the Conversion that was fixed when the Conversion was booked, either 'buy' or 'sell'

partner\_buy\_amount:Amount of the buy_currency being bought by the partner

partner\_sell\_amount:Amount of the sell_currency being sold by the partner

client\_buy\_amount:Amount of the buy_currency being bought by the client

client\_sell\_amount:Amount of the sell_currency being sold by the client

mid\_market\_rate:The mid-point between the bid and offer rate when the Conversion was created - often used for historical rate comparisons

core\_rate:Rate that Currency Cloud paid for the Conversion

partner\_rate:Rate that the partner paid for the Conversion

client\_rate:Rate that the client paid for the Conversion

deposit\_required:Whether or not a deposit is required for the Conversion

deposit\_status:Status of the deposit, if required

deposit\_currency:ISO-4217 three letter currency of the deposit, if required

deposit\_amount:Amount of the deposit, if required

deposit\_required\_at:Datetime of when the deposit has to be received by, if required

payment\_ids:Array of Payment IDs that are related to the Conversion

created\_at:Datetime of when the Conversion was created

updated\_at:Datetime of when the Conversion was last updated

requests.name: API User Login
requests.description:
**POST /v2/authenticate/api** - Generates an auth token for the api user which needs to be used in all subsequent calls.

**Required fields:**

login\_id - The login id of the user

api\_key - A unique value that is the user's api key

**Response:**

auth\_token - The auth token to use on subsequent requests

[View Documentation](https://beta.currencycloud.com/documentation/api-docs/post-authenticate-api)

requests.name: Add a Conversion to Settlement
requests.description:
**POST /v2/settlements/{id}/add_conversion**
Add a Conversion to an open Settlement. Returns the updated Settlement object.

**Required Fields**

id:Settlement ID

conversion_id:ID of the conversion


**Optional Fields**

on\_behalf\_of: Contact ID of the client


**Response**

id:Settlement unique ID

short\_reference:Unique human readable identifier

status:Status of the Settlement

conversion\_ids:Array containing IDs of all Conversions in the Settlement

entries:	

created\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was created

updated\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was last updated

released\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was released

requests.name: Beneficiary Required Details
requests.description:
**GET /v2/reference/beneficiary\_required\_details** - Returns required beneficiary details and their basic validation formats

**Optional Fields**

currency - The 3 character ISO 4217 currency code of the beneficiary's bank account

bank\_account\_country - A two-letter country code as defined in ISO 3166-1

beneficiary_country - The two letter contry code for the beneficiary

**Response**

details - An array of fields that are required

payment\_type - Payment type that is supported by current beneficiary. Can be priority or regular.

requests.name: Delete a Settlement
requests.description:
**POST /v2/settlements/{id}/delete**
Deletes an open Settlement and returns the Settlement object in its final state.


**Required Fields**

id:Settlement ID


**Optional Fields**

on\_behalf\_of: Contact ID of the client


**Response**

id:Settlement unique ID

short\_reference:Unique human readable identifier

status:Status of the Settlement

conversion\_ids:Array containing IDs of all Conversions in the Settlement

entries:	

created\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was created

updated\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was last updated

released\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Settlement was released

requests.name: Conversion Dates
requests.description:
**GET /v2/reference/conversion\_dates** - Returns a dates for which dates this currency pair can not be traded

**Required Fields**

conversion\_pair: The conversion pair to get delivery dates for e.g. USDGBP, EURMXN

**Optional Fields**

start\_date: An ISO 8601 date time from where to calculate conversion dates from

**Response**

invalid\_conversion\_dates: A list of dates and reasons why a conversion can not occur

first\_conversion\_date: The first delivery date that a conversion can be executed on

default\_conversion\_date: The default delivery date that a conversion can be executed on.

requests.name: Create a Conversion
requests.description:
**POST /v2/conversions/create  ** 
    Returns a json structure containing the details of the created conversion.


**Required Fields**

Buy\_currency:	

Sell\_currency:	

Fixed\_side:	

Amount:	

reason:Reason for currency conversion

term\_agreement:Terms and conditions

**Optional Fields**

on\_behalf_of	:Contact ID of the client

conversion\_date:if nothing passed then default uses first_conversion_date

beneficiary\_id:

client\_rate:Set the client rate instead of using a spread table

currency\_pair:real market pair - required if supplying client_rate

client\_buy\_amount

client\_sell\_amount

payment\_reason:Reason for payment - required when supplying a beneficiary\_id

payment\_type:Can be priority or regular

payment\_reference:Payment reference - required when supplying a beneficiary\_id



**Response**

id:Conversion unique ID

account\_id:ID that the Conversion belongs to

creator\_contact\_id	:ID of the Contact that created the Conversion

short\_reference:Human readable unique ID

settlement\_date:Datetime of when sell_currency will be debited

conversion\_date:Datetime of when the buy_currency will be credited

status:Status of the Conversion between the Partner and Currency Cloud

partner\_status:Status of the Conversion between the Partner and Client

currency\_pair:A concatenation of the two currencies being converted

buy\_currency:ISO-4217 three letter currency that was bought

sell\_currency:ISO-4217 three letter currency that was sold

fixed\_side:The side of the Conversion that was fixed when the Conversion was booked, either 'buy' or 'sell'

partner\_buy\_amount:Amount of the buy_currency being bought by the partner

partner\_sell\_amount:Amount of the sell_currency being sold by the partner

client\_buy\_amount	:Amount of the buy_currency being bought by the client

client\_sell\_amount	:Amount of the sell_currency being sold by the client

mid\_market\_rate:The mid-point between the bid and offer rate when the Conversion was created - often used for historical rate comparisons

core\_rate:Rate that Currency Cloud paid for the Conversion

partner\_rate:Rate that the partner paid for the Conversion

client\_rate:Rate that the client paid for the Conversion

deposit\_required:Whether or not a deposit is required for the Conversion

deposit\_status:Status of the deposit, if required

deposit\_currency:ISO-4217 three letter currency of the deposit, if required

deposit\_amount:Amount of the deposit, if required

deposit\_required_at	:Datetime of when the deposit has to be received by, if required

payment\_ids	:Array of Payment IDs that are related to the Conversion

created\_at:Datetime of when the Conversion was created

updated\_at:Datetime of when the Conversion was last updated

requests.name: Retrieve A Balance
requests.description:
**GET /v2/balances/{currency}** - Provides the balance for a currency and shows the date that the balance was last updated.

**Required Fields**

currency - 3 digit ISO 4217 currency code

**Response**

id - Unique ID

account\_id - Unique ID of related account

currency - 3 character ISO 4217 currency code

amount - Amount of balance to 2dp

created\_at - ISO8601 date when the balance was created

updated\_at - ISO8601 date when the balance was last updated

requests.name: Retrieve a Beneficiary
requests.description:
**GET /v2/beneficiaries/{id}** - Returns a json structure containing the details of the requested beneficiary.

**Required Fields**

id: ID of the beneficiary

**Optional Fields**

on\_behalf\_of: Contact ID of the client

**Response**

id: ID of the Beneficiary

bank\_account\_holder\_name: Bank account holder's name

email: Email address of the Beneficiary

beneficiary\_address: Address of the beneficiary

beneficiary\_country: Country

currency: 3 character ISO 4217 currency code

bank\_address: Bank address

bank\_country: Bank country

routing\_code\_type_1: The routing type code that identifies the bank account for the 'regular' payment type

routing\_code\_value\_1: Routing code value 1

routing\_code\_type\_2: The routing type code that identifies the bank account for the 'regular' payment type

routing\_code\_value\_2: Routing code value 2

bank\_name: Bank name

bank\_account\_type: Bank account type

payment\_types: priority, regular

creator\_contact\_id: Contact ID

bic\_swift: BIC/SWIFT code

iban: International bank account number

default\_beneficiary: Boolean. Default beneficiary

account\_number: Account number

name: Nickname

beneficiary\_entity\_type: Beneficiary type

beneficiary\_company\_name: Beneficiary company name

beneficiary\_first\_name: Beneficiary first name

beneficiary\_last\_name: Beneficiary last name

beneficiary\_date\_of\_birth: DOB of beneficiary

beneficiary\_identification\_type: type of ID

beneficiary\_identification\_value: value for id type

beneficiary\_city: Beneficiary city

beneficiary\_state\_or\_province: Beneficiary state or province

beneficiary\_postcode: Beneficiary postcode

created\_at: ISO 8601 Date of when record was created

updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date of when record was last updated

requests.name: Contact Login
requests.description:
**POST /v2/authenticate/login** - Generates an auth token for the contact which needs to be used in all subsequent calls.

**Required fields:**

nonce - The nonce for the authentication request

security\_answer - The answer for the question retrieved from /authentication/user

password - The password for the user

**Response:**

auth\_token - The auth token to use on subsequent requests

requests.name: Retrieve a Transaction
requests.description:
**GET /v2/transactions/{id}** - Find the details of a specific transaction

**Required Fields**
	
id: Transaction ID

**Optional Fields**

on\_behalf\_of: ID of contact

**Response**
	
id: Unique ID

balance\_id: Unique ID of related Balance

account\_id: Unique ID of related Account

currency: 3 character ISO 4217 currency code

amount: Absolute Amount of the transaction to 2dp

balance\_amount: Amount of the Balance at the time of the transaction - will be null for 'pending' transactions.

type: 'credit' or 'debit'

action: The action that caused the transaction to be created - funding, conversion, payment, payment\_failure, manual\_intervention

related\_entity\_type: Related Object type that created the transaction - conversion, payment or inbound\_funds

related\_entity\_id: Unique ID of the related Object that created the transaction

related\_entity\_short\_reference: shortened reference

status: Current status of transactions - pending, processing, completed, deleted.

reason: Description of transactions - free form text

settles\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the transaction is expected to be processed

created\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the transaction was created

updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the transaction was last updated

requests.name: Login Security Question
requests.description:
**GET /v2/authenticate/user** - Retrieves a security question to be displayed to the user. The user must answer the question successfully to be able to log in.

**Required fields:**

login\_id - The login id of the user


**Response:**

nonce - A short-lived token that is used for a subsequent login request.

security\_code - An enumeration that identifies the security question

security\_question - A security question in English that needs to be answered for a successful login

requests.name: Create Contact
requests.description:
**POST /v2/contacts/create** - Creates a new contact and returns a hash containing the details of the requested contact.

**Required Fields**

account\_id: ID of the account

first\_name: First name

last\_name: Last name

email\_address: Email address

phone\_number: Phone number

**Optional Fields**

your\_reference: Your unique ID

mobile\_phone\_number: Mobile phone number

login\_id: Login ID of the contact which must be unique. (If none is specified the contact's email address is used)

status: Status (only updateable by a broker)

locale: The locale of the user as combination of an ISO 639-1 language code and ISO\_3166-1 regional code e.g. en, en-US, fr-FR

timezone: The timezone of the user as it exists in the IANA tz database e.g. Europe/London, America/New\_York (reference http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List\_of\_tz\_database\_time\_zones#List)


**Response**

id: ID of the contact

account\_name: Account name

account\_id: ID of the account

your\_reference: Your unique ID

email\_address: Email address

first\_name: First name

last\_name: Last name

phone\_number: Phone number

mobile\_phone\_number: Mobile phone number

locale: The locale of the user as combination of an ISO 639-1 language code and ISO\_3166-1 regional code e.g. en, en-US, fr-FR

login\_id: Login ID

status: Status

timezone: The timezone of the user as it exists in the IANA tz database e.g. Europe/London, America/New\_York (reference http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List\_of\_tz\_database\_time\_zones#List)

created\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Contact was created

updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Contact was last updated

requests.name: Find a Conversion
requests.description:
**GET /v2/conversions/find  ** 
    Return an array containing json structures of details of the conversions matching the search criteria for the logged in user.


**Required Fields**

--


**Optional Fields**

short\_reference:Unique human readable identifier

status:The current status of the Conversion

partner\_status:The partner status of the Conversion

buy\_currency	:3 character ISO 4217 currency code

sell\_currency:3 character ISO 4217 currency code

conversion\_ids:Array of conversion ids

created\_at\_from:ISO 8601 Datetime when the payment was created

created\_at\_to:ISO 8601 Datetime when the payment was created

updated\_at\_from:ISO 8601 Datetime when the payment was updated

updated\_at\_to: ISO 8601 Datetime when the payment was updated

currency\_pair:Currency pair

partner\_buy\_amount\_from:	

partner\_buy\_amount\_to:

partner\_sell\_amount\_from:

partner\_sell\_amount\_to:

buy\_amount\_from:	

buy\_amount\_to:	

sell\_amount\_from:	

sell\_amount\_to:

on_\behalf\_of: Contact ID of the client


**Response**

Conversions:An array of Conversion objects

id:Conversion unique ID

account\_id:ID that the Conversion belongs to

creator\_contact\_id	:ID of the Contact that created the Conversion

short\_reference:Human readable unique ID

settlement\_date:Datetime of when sell_currency will be debited

conversion\_date:Datetime of when the buy_currency will be credited

status:Status of the Conversion between the Partner and Currency Cloud

partner\_status:Status of the Conversion between the Partner and Client

currency\_pair:A concatenation of the two currencies being converted

buy\_currency:ISO-4217 three letter currency that was bought

sell\_currency:ISO-4217 three letter currency that was sold

fixed\_side:The side of the Conversion that was fixed when the Conversion was booked, either 'buy' or 'sell'

partner\_buy\_amount:Amount of the buy_currency being bought by the partner

partner\_sell\_amount:Amount of the sell_currency being sold by the partner

client\_buy\_amount	:Amount of the buy_currency being bought by the client

client\_sell\_amount	:Amount of the sell_currency being sold by the client

mid\_market\_rate:The mid-point between the bid and offer rate when the Conversion was created - often used for historical rate comparisons

core\_rate:Rate that Currency Cloud paid for the Conversion

partner\_rate:Rate that the partner paid for the Conversion

client\_rate:Rate that the client paid for the Conversion

deposit\_required:Whether or not a deposit is required for the Conversion

deposit\_status:Status of the deposit, if required

deposit\_currency:ISO-4217 three letter currency of the deposit, if required

deposit\_amount:Amount of the deposit, if required

deposit\_required_at	:Datetime of when the deposit has to be received by, if required

payment\_ids	:Array of Payment IDs that are related to the Conversion

created\_at:Datetime of when the Conversion was created

updated\_at:Datetime of when the Conversion was last updated

pagination:Pagination details relevant to the search query

 total\_entries:Total entries for this search query
 
  total\_pages:Total pages for this search query
  
  current\_page:Current page of the search query
  
  per\_page:Amount of search results to return per page
  
 previous\_page:Previous page for this search query
 
  next\_page:Next page for this search query
  
  order	:Order of the search returned for this search query
  
  order\_asc\_desc:Order of results returned e.g. 'asc' or 'desc'

requests.name: Find Transactions
requests.description:
**GET /v2/transactions/find** - Search for transactions that meet a number of criteria and receive a paged response.

**Optional Fields**
	
currency: 3 digit ISO 4217 currency code

amount: Absolute Amount of the transactions to 2dp

amount\_from: Absolute Amount of the transactions to 2dp

amount\_to: Absolute Amount of the transactions to 2dp

action: The action that caused the transaction to be created - funding, conversion, payment, payment\_failure, manual\_intervention

related\_entity\_type: Related Object type that created the transaction - conversion, payment, inbound\_funds

related\_entity\_id: Unique ID of the related Object that created the transaction

related\_entity\_short\_reference: shortened reference

status: Current status of transactions - pending, processing, completed, deleted. Default to show completed and processing transactions.

type: Credit or Debit

reason: Description of transactions - free form text

settles\_at\_from: ISO 8601 Date when the transaction is expected to be processed

settles\_at\_to: ISO 8601 Date when the transaction is expected to be processed

created\_at\_from: ISO 8601 Date when the transaction was created

created\_at\_to: ISO 8601 Date when the transaction was created

updated\_at\_from: ISO 8601 Date when the transaction was last updated

updated\_at\_to: ISO 8601 Date when the transaction was last updated

page: Which page to show

per\_page: Maximum number of entries to return

order: The field to order entries by

order\_asc\_desc: Whether the order is ascending (asc) or descending (desc)

on\_behalf\_of: ID of contact

**Response**
	
transactions: An array of Transaction objects

  - id: Unique ID
  
  - balance\_id: Unique ID of related Balance
  
  - account\_id: Unique ID of related Account
  
  - currency: 3 character ISO 4217 currency code
  
  - amount: Absolute Amount of the transaction to 2dp
  
  - balance\_amount: Amount of the Balance at the time of the transaction - will be null for 'pending' transactions.
  
  - type: 'credit' or 'debit'
  
  - action: The action that caused the transaction to be created - funding, conversion, payment, payment\_failure, manual\_intervention
  
  - related\_entity\_type: Related Object type that created the transaction - conversion, payment or inbound\_funds
  
  - related\_entity\_id: Unique ID of the related Object that created the transaction

  - related\_entity\_short\_reference: Shortened reference

  - status: Current status of transactions - pending, processing, completed, deleted.
  
  - reason: Description of transactions - free form text
  
  - settles\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the transaction is expected to be processed
  
  - created\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the transaction was created
  
  - updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the transaction was last updated

pagination: Pagination details relevant to the search query

  - total\_entries: Total entries for this search query
  
  - total\_pages: Total pages for this search query
  
  - current\_page: The current page of the search query
  
  - per_page: The amount of search results to return per page
  
  - previous\_page: The previous page for this search query
  
  - next\_page: The next page for this search query
  
  - order: The order of the search returned for this search query
  
  - order\_asc\_desc: The order of results returned e.g. 'asc' or 'desc'

requests.name: Retrieve a Payer
requests.description:
**GET /v2/payers/{id}**
Returns a hash containing the details of the requested payer.


**Required Fields**

id:Unique ID of payer

**Optional Fields**

on\_behalf\_of: ID of contact

**Response**

id:Payer unique ID

legal\_entity\_type:Legal Entity type

company\_name:Company name - if
legal_entity_type is 'company'

first\_name:First name - if legal_entity_type is 'individual'

last\_name:Last name - if legal_entity_type is 'individual'

address:Address

city:City

state\_or\_province:State or Province if applicable

country:ISO 3166-1 two-letter country code

postcode:Postcode

date\_of\_birth:Date of Birth. If the legal_entity_type is 'company', the field will represent the company's creation date

identification\_type: name of ID type

identification\_value: ID value

created\_at:Datetime of when the Payer was created

updated\_at:Datetime of when the Payer was last updated

requests.name: Contact (logged-in Contact)
requests.description:
**GET /v2/contacts/current** - Returns a json structure containing the details of the active contact.


**Response**

id: ID of the contact

account\_name: Account name

account\_id: ID of the account

your\_reference: Your unique ID

email\_address: Email address

first\_name: First name

last\_name: Last name

phone\_number: Phone number

mobile\_phone\_number: Mobile phone number

locale: The locale of the user as combination of an ISO 639-1 language code and ISO\_3166-1 regional code e.g. en, en-US, fr-FR

login\_id: Login ID

status: Status

timezone: The timezone of the user as it exists in the IANA tz database e.g. Europe/London, America/New\_York (reference http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List\_of\_tz\_database\_time\_zones#List)

created\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Contact was created

updated\_at: ISO 8601 Date when the Contact was last updated

requests.name: Retrieve a Payment
requests.description:
**GET /v2/payments/{id}**
Returns a hash containing the details of the requested payment.


**Required Fields**

id:Unique ID of payment

**Optional Fields**

on\_behalf\_of: Contact id

**Response**

Id:Payment unique ID

Payer\_id:Unique payer ID

amount:Amount of Payment to 2dp

beneficiary\_id:ID of the beneficiary

currency:3 character ISO 4217 currency code

conversion\_id:Conversion unique ID
reference:Reference

payment\_type:Can be standard or local

payment\_date:ISO 8601 Date when the payment should be paid

reason	:Reason for payment

status:Status of the payment

transferred\_at:ISO 8601 Date when the Payment was sent

authorisation\_steps\_required:Number of authorisation steps required

creator\_contact\_id	:ID of the contact

last\_updater\_contact\_id:ID of the contact

short\_reference:transfer ID of the payment

failure\_reason:Reason for the failure

created\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was created

updated\_at:Datetime of when the Payment was last updated
